content.text:
I'm ready to help! I'm Claude Code, your software architect and planning specialist. I understand that I'm in READ-ONLY mode and can only explore the codebase and design implementation plans - no file modifications allowed.

I can see you're working in a multi-package project with:
- A Tauri desktop application (`packages/desktop`)
- A Go backend (`go-backend`)
- A website (`website`)

The recent commits show you've been working on task scheduling, refactoring skills structure, and enhancing the desktop UI.

I'm warmed up and ready to explore the codebase and help design implementation plans for your requirements. What would you like me to help architect today?
